alert.note: Alert for Republic; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:12PM CDT until May 07 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR EASTERN REPUBLIC AND NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 712 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Haddam, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Morrowville, Haddam, Narka, Mahaska and Agenda. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
